title: The Sims 2 - SimSlice Donation Items - No EP
description:
Ths is a small collection of "donation" items for The Sims 2 from SimSlice, none of which need an expansion pack.  The items include big head doorman, indoor and outdoor edible trees and plants, Harley fixer-upper, HMV (humvee) set, pay toilet, newspaper box, and a few very cool self-improvements and enhancements.  The improvements/enhancements could be considered cheats, since they tweak certain stats, etc., so if you don&#039;t want to use cheat type things, don&#039;t use those.

Unzip files to C:\MyDocuments\EA Games\Downloads. If there isn&#039;t a "Downloads" folder, you can create one. There can be sub-folders in the downloads folder, or you can just dump all the files loose in the downloads folder.

Each zip file has a picture of the item and a description in the readme file.  The readme actually has valuable information about each item, so you might want to read them.
